message: Clear takes a step toward the man.
I dunno what, but something has changed. Clear suddenly seems... different.
The gangsters take up position on either side of him.

name: クリア
message: "No one gets away with hurting my master."

name: チンピラＡ
message: "You don't know when to shut up..."
Without warning, Clear drives his fist into the punk's face.
That's surprising enough... but what really shocks me is how far the guy goes flying. How strong is Clear anyway?
Even before the punk has landed, Clear spins gracefully to face the man in the glasses.

name: クリア
message: "You're the one who hurt my master. I can't let you get away with that."
Dark fury has replaced the gangster's composure. He lunges forward and grabs Clear by the collar.

name: 兄貴
message: "Who the hell do you think you―"
I tug hard on Clear's shoulder.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm fine! Just listen to me, okay? Stop."
Clear's shoulders sink as his anger fades.
Now all three yakuza lie sprawled out on the ground.
Man... How did this even happen?
It was like Clear just suddenly snapped or something...
Making sure Clear is behind me, I hurry back to Glitter.
